name: Appointment-scheduling-app
tagline: The open source of the SimplyBook.me admin booking and scheduling app
body: ![Simplybook.me is a powerful appointment and booking scheduling software](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5059049/SimplyBook%20presentation%20image.PNG)The official page of SimplyBook.me. Here we will distribute the code of our mobile apps. Our users and resellers can use the code to create their own apps that will be communicating with the [simplybook.me appointment and booking software solution](https://simplybook.me)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
